item.title: Cloud Security Architect
item.description:
Role Overview

As a Cloud Security Architect, you will be responsible for designing and implementing comprehensive security architectures for cloud-based systems and applications. This role requires deep expertise in cloud platforms, security frameworks, and the ability to balance security requirements with business objectives and operational efficiency.

You will work with cross-functional teams to ensure security is built into cloud solutions from the ground up, not bolted on as an afterthought. This position offers the opportunity to shape the future of cloud security in a rapidly growing organization.

item.title: Penetration Tester
item.description:
Role Overview

As a Penetration Tester, you will be responsible for conducting authorized simulated attacks on our clients’ systems to identify vulnerabilities before malicious actors can exploit them. This role combines technical expertise with creative problem-solving to help organizations strengthen their security posture.

Key Responsibilities

  • Conduct comprehensive penetration testing on web applications, networks, mobile applications, and cloud infrastructure.

  • Perform vulnerability assessments and security audits to identify weaknesses in client systems and applications.
